snippet: The Hungry Duck, a bar that embodied the gold rush mentality of the Yeltsin era, has reopened in a city that is barely recognizable.
abstract: Moscow Journal; Hungry Duck, a decadent Yeltsin-era dive bar in Moscow that was shut down by local officials in 1999, reopens in a city that has since been transformed under Pres Vladimir Putin into a stable and glamorous capital.
lead_paragraph: The Hungry Duck, a bar that embodied the gold rush mentality of the Yeltsin era, has reopened in a city that is barely recognizable.

headline.seo: Moscow’s Hungry Duck Recalls Decadent Heyday
headline.main: A Decadent Reminder of Russia Before Putin
headline.print_headline: A Decadent Reminder Of Russia Before Putin
